schema.name: Healthyfied Fresh Mushroomsoup

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the button mushrooms, broccoli, cauliflower, red onion, and green capsicum under cold water.
Chop the button mushrooms, broccoli, cauliflower, red onion, and green capsicum into bite-sized pieces.
In a large pot, bring 3 cups of water to a boil.
Add the chopped vegetables and garlic (Spice World) to the boiling water, and simmer for 15 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Stir in the coconut cream powder, salt, and ground pepper, and continue to simmer for another 5 minutes.

schema.description: Indulge in a bowl of Healthyfied Fresh Mushroom Soup, perfect for those seeking a nutritious meal without compromising on taste. This delightful soup is not only low in sodium and high in fiber but also aligns with a health-conscious lifestyle. Packed with fresh mushrooms, broccoli, red onions, green capsicum, and cauliflower, and subtly enhanced with coconut cream and spices, it's a guilt-free indulgence for health aficionados.
